title: The Lost Sheep
description: Come for a visit to Karsten Field with these Biblically inspired stories of home and family. Best-selling author George Michael Loughmueller goes back to Karsten Field for a new serialized novel. Almost eight years after his journey began, Allan and Mary now have two children, Benjamin and Ruth, in their Amish Home. Volume 3 â€“The Lost Sheep teaches Allan a valuable lesson about tending to his flock. This story is told from the point of view of five-year-old Ruth. She sees the events of the flood and drought from a unique perspective. When it comes time to reap their blessings, Allan takes Ruth with him to the auction at the county fair. A frightening event leads to the discovery of a very special gift.
author: George Michael Loughmueller
